entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Ulukhaktok
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:26 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ulukhaktok Airport 8:00 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023
Temperature: -15.5°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Humidity: 77 %

Dewpoint: -18.6°C
Wind: E 61 km/h gust 78 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blizzard. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:36 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:36 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow in the evening. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:36 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023
